ViewObject.Name: ChecklistSearchVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT CIEO.CHECKLIST_INSTANCE_ID, CIEO.OWNER_ID, WCEO.CHECKLIST_NAME, WCEO.ROOT_CAT_TYPE, WCEO.CATEGORY_TYPE, WCEO.CHECKLIST_ID, TEO.TASK_TYPE, FIEO.CREATION_DATE, TO_CHAR(FIEO.CREATION_DATE, 'mm/dd/yyyy') AS CREATIONDATESTRING, FIEO.CREATED_BY, FTIEO.STATUS, (SELECT MEANING FROM H_LOOKUPS WHERE lookup_type = 'UI_STATUS' AND Lookup_Code = FTIEO.UI_TASK_STATUS) AS MEANING, (SELECT MEANING FROM H_LOOKUPS WHERE lookup_type = 'TASK_TYPE' AND Lookup_Code = TEO.TASK_TYPE) AS MEANING1, (SELECT MEANING FROM H_LOOKUPS WHERE lookup_type = 'TASK_CATEGORY' AND Lookup_Code = WCEO.ROOT_CAT_TYPE) AS MEANING2 FROM (SELECT NVL(Category_Type, (SELECT CEO.Category_Type FROM PAYC_VL CEO WHERE CEO.Parent_Checklist_Id IS NULL START WITH CEO.Checklist_Id = CEO1.Checklist_Id CONNECT BY checklist_id = prior Parent_Checklist_Id )) AS ROOT_CAT_TYPE, CEO1.* --to be improve, replace '*'. FROM PAYC_VL CEO1 WHERE base_flow_id = 3001 ) WCEO, PAYC_INS CIEO, PAY_FT_INS FTIEO, PAYFT_VL FlowTEO, PAYT_VL TEO, PAYF_INS FIEO WHERE WCEO.BCHECKLIST_ID = CIEO.BCHECKLIST_ID AND CIEO.FT_INSTANCE_ID = FTIEO.FT_INSTANCE_ID AND WCEO.BFT_ID = FlowTEO.BFT_ID AND FlowTEO.BT_ID = TEO.BT_ID AND CIEO.Flow_Ins_Id = FIEO.Flow_Ins_Id AND (((WCEO.ldg IS NOT NULL --L_L case1 AND WCEO.lc IS NULL AND WCEO.ldg = 30012462 )) OR ((WCEO.lc IS NOT NULL --L_L case2 AND WCEO.ldg IS NULL AND WCEO.lc = 'CT' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT CHECKLIST_ID FROM PAYC_VL c1 WHERE WCEO.BCHECKLIST_ID = c1.BCHECKLIST_ID AND (c1.ldg IS NOT NULL AND c1.lc IS NULL AND c1.ldg = 30012462 )))) OR ((WCEO.ldg IS NULL --L_L case3 AND WCEO.lc IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT CHECKLIST_ID FROM PAYC_VL c2 WHERE WCEO.BCHECKLIST_ID = c2.BCHECKLIST_ID AND ((c2.ldg IS NOT NULL AND c2.lc IS NULL AND c2.ldg = 30012462) OR (c2.lc IS NOT NULL AND c2.ldg IS NULL AND c2.lc = 'CT' )))))) AND ('ALL' = 'ALL' OR WCEO.ROOT_CAT_TYPE = 'ALL') AND ('ALL' = 'ALL' OR FTIEO.UI_TASK_STATUS = 'ALL') AND FIEO.Flow_Ins_Id = 3001
